name: VENDETTA FOREVER
summary: WELCOME TO CULT ACTION PARADISE  Leap into the VENDETTA FOREVER: DEMO now!  Get a free hands-on with five frantic scenes and experience the future of the frenetic shooter.     VENDETTA FOREVER fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay, effortless acrobatic style and the all-new LO-KILL-MOTION mechanic, to create an unapologetic love letter to classic action cinema.
